alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Monroe (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 01 at 10:50PM CST until January 02 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * WHERE...Blount Smoky Mountains, Sevier Smoky Mountains, Cocke Smoky Mountains and Southeast Monroe Counties generally at or above 4000 feet elevation. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Monroe
